Weapon Display.name: Weapon Display
Weapon Display.fullText:
Daring Blade Attack 11Weapon Display

You spin your blade in a dazzling display and then slip the blade past your enemy’s defenses with astonishing precision.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Miss: The target is marked until the end of your next turn, and you regain the use of this power.

Effect: Your target grants combat advantage to you for this attack.


Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 56.
Weapon Display.flavor: You spin your blade in a dazzling display and then slip the blade past your enemy’s defenses with astonishing precision.
Weapon Display.range:
Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Miss: The target is marked until the end of your next turn, and you regain the use of this power.

Effect: Your target grants combat advantage to you for this attack.
Weapon Display.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
Weapon Display.onMiss: The target is marked until the end of your next turn, and you regain the use of this power.
Weapon Display.effect: Your target grants combat advantage to you for this attack.

Offensive Spin Slash.name: Offensive Spin Slash
Offensive Spin Slash.fullText:
Daring Blade Attack 20Offensive Spin Slash

You leap toward your foe, spinning through the air, your blade tracing a silvery arc, and when you strike, your enemy skitters back to find someone else to fight.

Daily        Martial, Rattling, Reliable, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your speed. You gain a +4 power bonus to Intimidate checks until the end of the encounter.

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, slide the target a number of squares up to its speed, and then the target is marked by an ally adjacent to the target or you, if you are adjacent to the target.


Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 57.
Offensive Spin Slash.flavor: You leap toward your foe, spinning through the air, your blade tracing a silvery arc, and when you strike, your enemy skitters back to find someone else to fight.
Offensive Spin Slash.range:
Melee weapon

Effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your speed. You gain a +4 power bonus to Intimidate checks until the end of the encounter.

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. AC

Hit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, slide the target a number of squares up to its speed, and then the target is marked by an ally adjacent to the target or you, if you are adjacent to the target.
Offensive Spin Slash.effect: Shift a number of squares equal to your speed. You gain a +4 power bonus to Intimidate checks until the end of the encounter.
Offensive Spin Slash.onHit: 4[W] + Charisma modifier damage, slide the target a number of squares up to its speed, and then the target is marked by an ally adjacent to the target or you, if you are adjacent to the target.

Defensive Posture (Daring Blade).name: Defensive Posture (Daring Blade)
Defensive Posture (Daring Blade).fullText:
Daring Blade Utility 12Defensive Posture (Daring Blade)

Flooded with arcane power, you dance away with astonishing speed to escape your foe’s attacks, all while daring your enemy to follow.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn, then shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed. Each ally that can see you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 376, page(s) 56.
Defensive Posture (Daring Blade).flavor: Flooded with arcane power, you dance away with astonishing speed to escape your foe’s attacks, all while daring your enemy to follow.
Defensive Posture (Daring Blade).range:
Personal

Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn, then shift a number of squares equal to one-half your speed. Each ally that can see you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
